titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning the Eucharist Deliuered on Easter day in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: James, Richard, 1592-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Harper?] for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop at the black Beare in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the black Beare in Pauls Church-yard
